summary: Provides a command-line tool that loads a HuggingFace text-to-image model checkpoint and its configuration, maps its weights to the equivalent NeMo architecture (e.g., Stable Diffusion or ControlNet), and writes the result as a NeMo .nemo checkpoint.
business_intent: Enables seamless migration of pretrained HuggingFace text-to-image models into the NVIDIA NeMo platform, allowing developers to reuse existing models within NeMo's training, fine-tuning, and inference pipelines.
